oracle.ord.im
Class OrdHttpUploadFileSource

java.lang.Object
  oracle.ord.im.OrdHttpUploadFileSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrdContentSource
public class OrdHttpUploadFileSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrdContentSource

An implementation class of OrdContentSource that supports using an OrdHttpUploadFile object as the content source. JSP or Java Servlet application developers can use it to process the content uploaded by the browser from an HTML FORM FILE INPUT element.

Since:
JDev5.0
Version:
JDev5.0
See Also:
OrdHttpUploadFile
